summary: The Python backend (FastAPI) responsible for AI orchestration, LangGraph agent workflows, and AIGC task execution.
context_hints: Work here for AI logic, LangGraph workflows, and LLM integrations
Handles the execution of tasks generated by the frontend
Manages the backend database and state persistence

subdirectories.src/master_clash/api: FastAPI routers and entry points. Defines the HTTP interface.
subdirectories.src/master_clash/workflow: LangGraph state graphs and workflow definitions. The core 'agent' logic resides here.
subdirectories.src/master_clash/services: Integrations with external AI services (OpenAI, Gemini, etc.) and other third-party APIs.
subdirectories.src/master_clash/agents: Specific agent implementations and tools used within workflows.

key_files.src/master_clash/api/main.py: The main FastAPI application entry point.
key_files.src/master_clash/config.py: Configuration loading and environment variable management.

architecture_notes: Uses FastAPI for the web layer and LangGraph for agent orchestration. Follows a service-layer pattern.
